body:
`geant4@11.0.1` does not yet depend on `geant4-data` (with the appropriate version). Adding a `geant4-data@11.0.1` version and making `geant4@11.0.1` depend on that.

Is there a more elegant way of setting these version locked dependencies. The current explicit list is a bit prone to forgetting to update it.
title: geant4-data: Add latest version to make it available for geant4
